name: RE: Request to open firewall to access API
content:

Best Regards,

Basha

From: TeBS Infra <TeBS_Infra@totalebizsolutions.com>
Sent: Thursday, August 24, 2023 2:21 PM
To: Shaik Mahaboob Basha <Mahaboob.SHAIK@totalebizsolutions.com>; Govindarajan
Ponnusamy <Govind.P@totalebizsolutions.com>
Cc: Irsath Mohideen <Irsath.M@totalebizsolutions.com>
Subject: RE: Request to open firewall to access API

 

Hi Govind,

 

Can help the below request to make it public ?

 

Thanks & Regards

Infra

 

From: Shaik Mahaboob Basha <Mahaboob.SHAIK@totalebizsolutions.com>
Sent: Thursday, August 24, 2023 10:33 AM
To: TeBS Infra <TeBS_Infra@totalebizsolutions.com>
Cc: Irsath Mohideen <Irsath.M@totalebizsolutions.com>
Subject: Request to open firewall to access API
Importance: High

 

Hi Team,

 

We are working on API implementation for one of the customer called SOTA.

Unfortunately we are facing some connectivity issues in Customer UAT environment
after API deployment.

From last one week we didn’t get any solution and there is other team waiting
for our API, where they have to develop other part of functionality of
application by accessing our API.

 

Our API we deployed in SIT environment(192.168.1.153) which is working fine as
expected, but our API currently cannot access outside without VPN connection.

Can you please help to access below domain without using VPN connectivity so we
can provide to customer to access API for their development until we found UAT
solution.

http://192.168.1.153:7854/

 

 

Thanks for understanding! Appreciate your response.

 

Best Regards,

Basha
